subject: Information about an order
description_text:
Dear Simsonn!

I would like to receive some information about my order placed on November 21(#SSN3717), It is currently in a confirmed status, but nothing happend in the last 6 days. My Other order (#SSN3783), is on it's way.

Thank you in advance for your reply.

Yours sincerely,

Gabor Bernhardt
